question_text: According to the Aegis-Link user manual, how long is the inactivity period before a user is automatically logged out?
ground_truth_answer: The Aegis-Link software will automatically log out a user after 30 minutes of inactivity.

retrieval_path.source_quote: Note: As per security requirements, the system will automatically log you out after 30 minutes of inactivity.

question_text: What information is displayed for the Hydra-C4 module in the Detailed Status View of the Aegis-Link software?
ground_truth_answer: When the Hydra-C4 is selected, the Detailed Status View displays its power status, internal temperature, current data throughput, and the results of the last Built-In Test (BIT).

retrieval_path.source_quote: For Hydra-C4: This view shows power status, internal temperature, current data throughput, and the results of the last BIT.

question_text: If an operator encounters an error that is not listed in the troubleshooting section of the user manual, what is the formal process they must follow?
ground_truth_answer: For any unlisted error, the operator must submit a Problem/Change Request (PCR). This action is governed by the process defined in the SS-CM-PLAN-001: Configuration Management Plan.

retrieval_path.source_quote: For all unlisted errors or feature requests, please submit a Problem/Change Request (PCR). The formal process for initiating and managing a PCR is defined in the SS-CM-PLAN-001: Configuration Management Plan.
The PCR is the sole mechanism for requesting a change to a baselined CI.

question_text: The Aegis-Link Operator Manual describes how to initiate a Built-In Test. Which parent document formally defines the requirement for the software to have this capability?
ground_truth_answer: The requirement for the Aegis-Link software to provide controls to initiate a Built-In Test on the Hydra-C4 module is formally defined in the Aegis-Link Software Requirements Specification (SS-AEG-SRS-001), requirement ID REQ-FUN-005.

retrieval_path.source_quote: In the Control Panel on the right, locate the 'Diagnostics' section. Click the Initiate BIT button.
REQ-FUN-005: The software shall provide controls to initiate a Built-In Test (BIT) on the Hydra-C4 module.

question_text: What is the default password for a new user account created in the Aegis-Link software?
ground_truth_answer: I am sorry, but the provided Operator User Manual does not contain information about default passwords for new users. This information would likely be managed by system administrators.
